attachments.title: Fitness Trackers Show How Many People Woke Up During the Bay Area Quake | Business | WIRED
attachments.text: The earthquake that struck Northern California early Sunday morning sent many local residents stumbling from their beds and scrambling for steady ground. How many? You can get good sense of all this nocturnal movement from an unexpected source: wearable fitness trackers that measure the sleeping patterns of the people who wear them. The Jawbone UPâ€¦

text: I like how over 20% of nearby users slept through it
i like that 4 people in Portland claim they felt it
